name: Rude Bear Gotchi
description:
When things are going well, you ought to just appreciate the life you have. Too much ambition can ultimately destroy you. Sometimes you just gotta let kids be kids if you want them to live life to the fullest.

If you stream this, leave it on screen view and not game view. You’ll see why! It’s pretty cool!

=== Controls ===

Click and drag, baby. Click and drag

=== Hints ===

  • I hear that raspberries and blueberries are healthier than other fruit.
  • I heard that birds really like to keep their feathers clean
  • I heard that some mushrooms are poisonous, but some are tasty
  • I heard that the end of the game is worth seeing

== What’s a Rude Bear? ==

This is the 24th extended universe Rude Bear game, and my 22nd Ludum Dare. It was made for Ludum Dare 48’s jam, under the theme “KEEP IT ALIVE”.

=== CREDITS === @AlexRoseGames - Code, Design, Animation @BitsAndCrafts - Dope ass Art @Atmospherium - Music & SFX
